info.title: MyHomeBP API
info.description: Blood Pressure Management API for NHS and Private GP Surgery Use in the UK

post.description: Authenticate admin user and return access token
Logout admin user and revoke current token

get.description: Get current authenticated admin user profile

system_response.example: Thank you for submitting today's reading.

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Number of days to retrieve readings for

get.summary: Get blood pressure averages and trends

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all doctors with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new doctor with specialities and clinic assignments

get.description: Retrieve a specific doctor by ID with optional relationships

delete.description: Delete a doctor (soft delete by setting is_active to false)

post.description: Attach one or more specialities to a doctor

is_primary.description: Speciality ID that should be primary

post.description: Attach one or more clinics to a doctor

get.summary: Get main ethnicity category by ID
Get subcategories for a specific main category
Get complete ethnicity hierarchy (categories with their subcategories)

comorbidities.description: Comorbidities: stroke, diabetes_type_1, diabetes_type_2, atrial_fibrillation, transient_ischaemic_attack, chronic_kidney_disease, others

comorbidities.description: Comorbidity Options: stroke, diabetes_type_1, diabetes_type_2, atrial_fibrillation, transient_ischaemic_attack, chronic_kidney_disease, others

others_comorbidities.description: Other comorbidities if 'others' is selected in comorbidities array

hypertension_diagnosis.description: Hypertension Diagnosis Options: yes, no, dont_know

medications.description: Array of medication objects (only required if hypertension_diagnosis is 'yes')

bnf_code.description: BNF medication code - Get available codes from /api/medications
